title: Pattern-oriented Attention Mechanism for Multivariate Time Series Forecasting
details: H Hu, Z Han, S Qian, D Yang, J Cao, G Xue - ACM Transactions on Knowledge …, 2025
abstract: Multivariate time series forecasting is applied in many domains, such as finance, transportation and industry. The main challenge of precise forecasting lies in accurately capturing latent dependencies. Recent studies develop various …
